All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Building
The class representing a building which provides and consumes resources and can be purchased
Building.Type
Building types
BuildingBuilder
The class used to set the different attributes of a building and return it
BuildingFactory
The class used to create buildings with specifics values as attributes
Citizens
The city habitants, consuming resources
City
The city of the game with its buildings, its habitants, its shop and its manager (the player)
Gold
The game resource used as money
Main
 
Material
The class representing the different materials in the game (resources that are purchasable)
Material.Type
 
Pair<K,V>
 
Player
The player (which is a shop buyer, which is a resource manager) and has a stock of resources
Purchasable
A resource that can be purchased with money (gold)
Quantity
 
Resource
An entity representing a resource in the game
ResourceFactory
The class used to create the different resources
Resources
The class defining "resources" as a collection of resources associated with a quantity
ResourcesConsumer
An entity consuming resources from the stock of a ResourcesManager
ResourcesManager
An entity in charge of managing a stock of resources
ResourcesProvider
An entity providing resources for a ResourcesManager
Shop
 
ShopBuyer
